name: Blue Barbarian Man
description:
Help the blue barbarian man retrieve his special blue holy sword in this indie platform game.
Indie platform game in which you control the blue barbarian man who has the sword to hint his opponents.
You can also jump on your enemies' heads to defeat them.
You need to collect items and defeat the bosses at the end of each level to win the game.
The game has 6 stages and two more secret stages.
